### Article 2: Fuels for Ireland warns of petrol and diesel price hikes

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.rte.ie/news/business/2026/0102/1551240-fuels-for-ireland-warns-of-petrol-and-diesel-price-hikes/)

## Summary

This article covers fuel price increases in Ireland and does not contain information relevant to Hyland as an IDP software vendor. The only connection is that Ger Hyland, President of the Irish Road Haulage Association, is quoted discussing fuel cost impacts on the transport industry, but this person appears unrelated to Hyland the technology company.

## Executive Insights

**Ger Hyland, President of Irish Road Haulage Association (IRHA)**

> "We got another 2 cent a litre of a carbon tax in the budget plus that. This morning we have between the renewable transport fuel obligation, the better energy levy, we have 4 cents plus that. The impact of all these changes is that the margin we have left to work with is minuscule at the present time."

*Context: Discussing fuel cost increases affecting transport industry*

*Significance: Industry leader expressing concerns about operational cost pressures*

**Ger Hyland, President of Irish Road Haulage Association (IRHA)**

> "I will be led by our members. If the feeling across our members is that there is need for protest, well then certainly I am up for the challenge, and I will lead that protest if needs be."

*Context: Responding to question about potential industry protests over fuel costs*

*Significance: Indicates potential for organized industry action over regulatory cost increases*

**James Bryan, certified financial planner with Hyland Lake Partners**

*Context: Discussing how different people handle windfalls differently*

*Significance: Provides insight into the personalized approach of financial planning services*

**James Bryan, certified financial planner with Hyland Lake Partners**

> "An old professor of mine long ago said, 'There are two types of people in this world, those that pay interest and those that earn it.' Absolutely eliminate every liability you can."

*Context: Advising on debt elimination strategy for windfall recipients*

*Significance: Demonstrates the financial philosophy and advisory approach*
